sentence: The letter to Ivanka Trump asking her to sit with the committee as soon as early February is the latest in a string of voluntary requests from the panel, including those sent to House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy (R-Calif.) and Reps. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio) and Scott Perry (R-Pa.).
author: Rebecca Beitsch
title: Jan. 6 committee asks Ivanka Trump to sit for interview

sentence: Again, on Jan. 10, Hannity texted Meadows and Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH), expressing some anxiety over a conversation he had had with Trump that day.
author: Josh Kovensky
title: ‘No More Crazies’: Trump’s Final Days In Office, As Documented By The Jan. 6 Committee

sentence: It has been well-documented that Trump spoke with several people, including Rep. Jim Jordan on January 6, but the incomplete records are leaving investigators “with gaps so far in their understanding of what transpired that day,” according to CNN.
author: David Badash
title: Gaps: Trump’s White House records missing calls made to and from president during Jan. 6 insurrection

sentence: Trump reportedly spoke with several members of Congress on January 6, 2021, including Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio), Sen. Tommy Tuberville (R-Ala.) and House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy (R-Calif.), whose call turned into a screaming match as McCarthy demanded that Trump condemn the rioters.
author: Nicholas Reimann
title: Jan. 6 Committee Reportedly Finds Sparse White House Records Of Trump Calls On Day Of Riot

sentence: Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH), for example, finally answered that he spoke to Trump on Jan. 6.
author: Sarah K. Burris
title: Documents handed to the Jan. 6 committee don't contain details about who was calling in and out of the White House: report

sentence: As CNN reported last week, they show that Trump spoke on the phone at the White House residence with key Hill ally GOP Rep. Jim Jordan of Ohio for 10 minutes on the morning of the January 6 -- before Jordan took to the House floor to object to the certification of President Joe Biden's Electoral College win.
author: Ryan Nobles
title: White House records obtained so far by January 6 committee show no record of calls to and from Trump during riot

sentence: She had the right to review his nominations, and she rejected Republican representative Jim Jordan, who has now been implicated in the events of the day, and Republican representative Jim Banks, who had attacked the committee as a partisan exercise “solely to malign conservatives and to justify the left’s authoritarian agenda”.
author: Heather Cox Richardson
title: Trump claims investigations into him are politically motivated. That is a lie

sentence: — Rep. Jim Jordan (@Jim_Jordan) April 7, 2022 Jordan, who recently won Donald Trump‘s endorsement in his bid for re-election, was quoting an interview Eric gave earlier this week to NDT’s “Capitol Report” about Hunter Biden’s laptop.
author: Graham Gremore
title: Eric Trump is trending because of Jim Jordan so you know something stupid happened

sentence: pic.twitter.com/yHLJkbXoRQ — Eric Trump (@EricTrump) April 13, 2022 Rep. Jim Jordan tweeted recently: Eric Trump: “If I did 1/100 of what Hunter Biden did, I’d be in jail.” He’s not wrong.
title: Eric Trump shares photo of woman sitting next to him on flight wearing a “Let's Go Brandon” Shirt
